website_summaries.verdict: Price and quirks aside, lots of anticipation and a fluffy, interactive toy make this a great choice for any young Hatchimals fan.
pros: The mystery of which character will hatch adds to the fun, as egg contains one of four possibilities
Toy is soft, cuddly, and interactive
Youngsters are thrilled with the character's adorable faces and pretty colors
cons: Parents have griped about the high price
Rare issues of eggs that wouldn't hatch

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money way too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Your child will be happy with it for like 1 hr but after it hatches it’s just going to end up in the pile of stuffed animals that get neglected. Way too expensive. This product should cost like $20 max..
customer_reviews.author: Christen cumba

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: As expected, giant dinosaurs come out and eat the neighbors. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: MORE PLEASE
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT 2 OF THESE IN JULY FOR MY GRAND CHILDEREN'S BIRTHDAY. BOY AND GIRL, THEY WERE SO HAPPY. IN THE PAST I HAVE GOTTEN THEM THE SMALL ONES IN THEDOZEN EGG CREAT. I WILL BE GETTING THEM MORE AT CHRISTMAS, THEY HAVE SO MUC FUN WITH THEM ITS HARD TO THINK ABOUT GETTING THEM ANYTHING ELSE. SHE IS 8 AND HE IS 6. HOPE THIS HELPS U.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fun, and fuzzy!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a fun experience! The whole family gathered around while my oldest daughter was hatching her Hatchimal. The eyes lit up and she followed the instructions on what to do with each color that appeared. The hatching took what felt like an eternity to my 3 very excited children which made the surprise egg so much more fun! It took maybe 5-10 minutes to peck through the shell. Her Elefly is so adorable and we really had to yank on it to get it out. She absolutely loves it and it’s a very fun and cute interactive toy!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Miller

customer_reviews.title: EXPENSIVE !! Does not worth the expense.20 minutes of fun
customer_reviews.text: STUPID INVETMENT ! Stupid toy. Took 30 minutes to lose interest!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dor

customer_reviews.title: Tiny compared to the original hatchimal
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are quite deceiving. As is the packaging!! The package is the same size as the original, but the egg and the stuffed animal are 1/2 the size. I bought two and my daughters loved them regardless, but I feel like it was money wasted when I could’ve gotten the larger original for a couple dollars more. I have the same issues everyone else has, it’s fun for 5 minutes then it’s just a $40 stuffed animal. They should change the packaging and be upfront with the small size of these. It’s misleading and crappy business practice.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Good birthday gift, not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My kindergartener has been begging for a Hatchimal for years, and I had managed to avoid buying one because I felt the price was too high for something so silly but, after two years of being asked, I figured that it was time to do a fun birthday gift. The birthday girl was thrilled. The item was as described. Unfortunately, the enthusiastic birthday girl decided her new Hatchimal needed a bath about four hours after hatching and I found her giving her new toy a bubble bath. Needless to say, this item is not waterproof and is now a fluffy paperweight that my six year old still loves. The kids are happy. The parents' eyes roll. All is well.
customer_reviews.author: kmgazaryan

customer_reviews.title: large hatchimals
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty, I purchased 4 of these at christmas. 3 were the exact same, only 1 was different. Disappointing. Plus the "hatching" was a real pain. And 1 didn't really work at all. I guess I expecting too much. All four kids were initially excited by these, but very, very quickly grew tired of the "hatching" and the lack luster after opening. Eh. They are, in my opinion the "new" furbees. Fun for a second, and then... Eh. Just my personal opinion.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Replacement needed, but it was fun
customer_reviews.text: At the first delivery, this Hatchimal came to me already hatched, keys removed, traces of tape around the keyholes, half of the eggshell gone. This was really confusing. It seems that I paid for a new toy but received a used one. But I must say, the Amazon staff was very helpful and efficient in arranging the replacement. The second delivery was good. I enjoyed playing it as an adult. The interaction with the egg and each of the stages could be longer. I went through all the stages within half a day. But that is not the the seller's problem. Hope the manufacturer could reprogramme it.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't work like a regular hatchimal!
customer_reviews.text: My son desperately wanted a new once since his was lost in a move. all I could find was this one and it didn't hatch. We've already hatched a couple of them so it's not like we did it wrong...and then it didn't behave like the other hatchimals we've had. You're supposed to be able to teach it and play games but it would just idk...shut off? Like we put it to sleep when we didn't. And it arrived after Xmas even though I was told it would arrive beforehand so between the crappy product and misleading ads/customer service it was a total waste of $
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with dead batteries so it did not work and my niece was in tears because she could not see it hatch or sing. We had to crack it open and found out the batteries were dead. The whole point of this toy is to see it hatch and we were very disappointed to see it arrive with dead batteries.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Our egg/hatching mechanism was broken and wouldn’t open
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. It was a gift for a 7 year old bday and the item we received was broken and would not hatch. I know bc this is our 2nd one. The first one worked fine. We had to break the shell and pull it out manually. The hatching part is essential in the gifting of this bc that’s what we are paying for. To have it hatch! I’m also upset bc I paid upward of $60 from a 3rd party seller before Amazon dropped the price by $20. I feel cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved it, that's all I needed.
customer_reviews.text: My niece mentioned she wanted this for Christmas, so of course, I had to get it for her. I hope spoiling her doesn't lead to issues later. Anyways, I was quite surprised by this toy. It starts out in an egg and you have to give it attention before it pecks its way out. Eventually it starts moving around by itself. It makes some very strange noises, but my niece is still playing with well into March, so at least it's stuck with her a lot more than other toys. As long as she's happy, it's a good toy, right?
customer_reviews.author: Lux

customer_reviews.title: Such a great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was such a cute gift for my daughters, they absolutely loved to watch the egg hatch. The materials actually very sturdy as well, their favorite thing about the item was how it’s Says their name like if it’s calling out to them it’s really cute. They also change in color I think it’s such a great gift idea, all my family was entertaining watching that egg hatch
customer_reviews.author: felipe

customer_reviews.title: NON STOP PECKING. COULDN"T TAKE OUT OF SHELL
customer_reviews.text: It took about 10mins for it to pecking through the shell, and the upper part of the shell is then taken away. However, no matter how we try, just not able to get the hatchimal away from its shell base, It is just so firmly attached to the base. Also, it just keep waking by itself and keep talking talking and talking. non stop. SOOOOO ANNOYING!!!!
customer_reviews.author: woods

customer_reviews.title: cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for we our granddaughter's 6th birthday. Shew was very excited. I was very pleased when the egg hatched within 30 mins. Very cute
customer_reviews.author: W. Watanabe

customer_reviews.title: Crazy interesting
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a bizarre blast. The Hatchimal literally pecks its way out of the egg. That was a blast. Prepare your child as it is a slow burn. Sometimes it doesn't start pecking out for 15 mins. I recommend reading the instruction before your child opens it. There was quite a lag between ripping paper and the hatching joy.
customer_reviews.author: oktarb

customer_reviews.title: Kids adore these!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed at the size of the egg compared to the packaging but my nieces don’t care. They’re 4 and 6 and love being mothers to these! The eyes light up to indicate what it wants and it can talk to them. They get so excited when their hatchimals do anything! These were the first Christmas presents they opened and they didn’t even care about opening anything after that. I thought they were a little spendy but it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so cool. We gave it to our 5 year old niece as a gift when she visited, and the whole family enjoyed watching it “hatch” and peck its way out of the egg. It’s so life-life! There were even pieces of “ egg shell” that flew off during the hatching process. Our niece had been asking for a pet, so she especially enjoyed caring for this Hatchimal. Worth the price just to watch it hatch!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: We put the batteries in but it's not responding we followed all the steps but it may have been a bad one in the batch the process of it hatching was great I was just sad that it didnt do what it said on the instructions it would do it just shut down and is unusable my kid was devastated thankfully it was christmas and I could distract her with a different toy
customer_reviews.author: michelle bruggeman

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Hatchimal came in one piece, thankfully because we were not opening it until Christmas. My little boy loved it and has so much fun with his pengula hatchimal. He gets so excited when it has a birthday, and I think he plays with it everyday still! Great buy and better price than most other places. I will definitely be purchasing another for his birthday, so they can play with one another.
customer_reviews.author: Potter

customer_reviews.title: Not everything it claims to be
customer_reviews.text: I would say that yes this was super exciting while it hatches. However after that it went through “stages” super quickly and was really just a useless toy. I did not see the growth or interaction it claimed to have. My daughter tired of it quickly. I figured this would happen, but still sad to witness.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany & Ian B

customer_reviews.title: Extremely cute and interactive
customer_reviews.text: We love hatchimals!! Three little girls and you can’t go wrong with a hatchimal. We got this for my middle age hatched in a couple hours and loves it! Super soft pink and teal hatchling inside. Egg was cute splatter painter. No damages to the packaging or product. Way better than furbys ever have been!
customer_reviews.author: tasha

customer_reviews.title: Grand-daughter loves
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grand-daughter she got twins. Lighter one was different egg the two purple were twins...
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got.it
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews on this and say many thought it was a waste of money.. My little girl LOVES this thing. I mean she still is carrying it around and teaching it words. It is super cute and if def buy again. Theyre kinda like furby but not exactly. We hatched it on Christmas and it didn't take long at all.
customer_reviews.author: chasity

customer_reviews.title: Hatchimal
customer_reviews.text: I was slow to hop on the bandwagon fearing these things were expensive gimmicky toys. And they sort of are, but they are fun and cute. Bought for my 2 & 6 year olds. Hatching was fun. They were mystery and they ended up getting the same ones, which actually cut down on flighting. You can program a greeting so it’s easy to tell who is who’s.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Awesome present It is amazing its worth the money. The Hachiman literally pecks its way out of the egg. That was a blast. Prepare your child as it is a slow burn. Sometimes it doesn't start pecking out for 15 mins. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: a****

customer_reviews.title: Cute novelty to paper weight
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son on my birthday. He begged for it. He ended up making me hatch it for him which was kind of cool for everyone at the party. But beyond that, it went the way of my furby when I was a kid. It's collecting dust on his desk. He's turned it on once. It's cute for the novelty and now it's a paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful interactive toy
customer_reviews.text: We all had a blast watching it hatch. Loved how interactive it is and so cute. Got this for my 10 year old grandson who thought it was silly at first but after his mom hatched it he loved it. He got the rainbow colored critter. So adorable I want one and will keep it on my desk at work!
customer_reviews.author: lee hartsell

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift to hatch
customer_reviews.text: My 6-year-old really loves getting her Hatchimals for Christmas. The unhatchimg is quite an event, and the toy is cute. The packaging is a little difficult, the toy is difficult to get out of the egg base. Five mo the later, the Hatchimals doesn’t get played with much. I wish it was a little more fun after the hatching.
customer_reviews.author: Tara  Lebow Merrell

customer_reviews.title: DIDN’T HATCH! 👎🏼 UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: DIDN’T HATCH! Literally rubbed for over 1 hour and 15 minutes (by adult). Toddler was bored and quit caring about egg after 20 minutes of holding/rubbing. Will be calling company tomorrow! UPDATED on 1-12-19: Company sent new Hatchimal free of charge and it did hatch! Got the same animal though, but it was nice it at least worked this time!
customer_reviews.author: Hello!

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: The kids love them but it is short lived, the most fun is getting it to hatch. Then you have a hard, stuffed animal that the eyes light up, it makes some noise and if they have wheels, it will move around a bit. That's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Eoine

customer_reviews.title: Cute, entertaining and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Entertaining. Precious . It was great fun to watch it hatch (it smashes little pieces of the shell with it's beak) it squaks and makes all sorts of exciting sounds as well as lights its eyes up different colors. The kids aren't into the long sheet of what means what but for $40 it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Do not spend  your money on this item.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this egg in advance of my son's birthday. When we tried to get it to hatch, it wouldn't. When we turn it on, the lights in its eyes are green. They tell you it is sick so rub it head...yeah right. This product does not match the cheaper version that is sold elsewhere. No wonder they dropped the price.
customer_reviews.author: James Madden

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Just what we order... the little thing is annoying but I does what its suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: SavannahJen

customer_reviews.title: Upset child.
customer_reviews.text: Opening the hatchimal was fun for my 7 year old but as soon as it was time to pop the hatchimal out we noticed the left wing was not working. Highly upset. Will not purchase again. Now she just has a toy that sits on a dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Weird toy that I think is stupid but kids like it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 for christmas. I thought this was dumb. I didn't quite understand it. It is easy enough to use though and has a good guide for easily figuring it out. Once it hatches it's kinda cute though. I found myself last night playing with it since kids pretty quickly stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra J. Florentine

customer_reviews.title: Regretful purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I've looked over the directions more times than I can count and I guess mine is defective or something because it never learned my daughter's name. The instructions claim it can. It also does this god awful, annoying song sequence/seizure for a minute or two when it first "wakes up."
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Bass

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: My daughter begged for it. It is cute, interactive, and fun. It's also annoying, loud, and repetitive. My daughter loved ot but lost interest very quickly. I don't think it is worth the price tag even though it is made well.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Paulk

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous toy.
customer_reviews.text: Grandchild loved it. It's a very neat toy. A 4 year old may be too young to really understand what to do with it, she peeled the shell off 20 seconds after she got it so the bird inside did a lot of mock pecking for the next 24 hours. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Carla votaw

customer_reviews.title: Mehh
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than anticipated and annoying as all get out. But my kid loves it so there's that. It's a less creepy version of the Furby, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great product, starts out slow.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift! Kiddo aged 6 loved it! The bird pecked out of its shell within only minutes, although the instructions make it seem like it should’ve taken about a good week, lol! She loves taking care of her bird, however keeps it off most of the day because the “toddler stage”, is repetitive and a bit on the boring side. Hopefully, the bird will learn her name and more “adult-like” actions to keep my daughter occupied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for little kids
customer_reviews.text: Cute little critter. It is like all the other robot toys out there when it comes down to it though, pet them, feed them, love them and they respond more. My daughter is five and she loves it, so who am I to judge it on originality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this toy got it as her Xmas gift only this is that it took a lot of rubbing to get it to hatch . I honestly thought it was a small area to push and it would crack. Not like that at all. Would suggest watch YouTube to know how to crack it.
customer_reviews.author: Shortboss

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working properly upon turning from an egg to a baby. Very very disappointing. The egg was very interactive and fun and once it got out of it, something happened or something just didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Guy N.

customer_reviews.title: Not for young children
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not for a 6 yr old. My daughter begged for this toy. She received it for Christmas. She fell in love with it... Untill it hatched. We have read the instructions with her but she still doesn't understand it. I would recommend this for older kids but not young.
customer_reviews.author: M0mmi3

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for us!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as a gift for Christmas just for her to be upset and sad. The hatchimal packed twice and never worked again. Waste of money and even worse is to see how upset my daughter was.
customer_reviews.author: pm

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. My son enjoyed it. It didnt take as long as I expected to hatch and he enjoys playing and teaching it.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: This thing really hatches and it is a little weird ...
customer_reviews.text: The hatching part was very interesting as I had never seen anything quite like it. My daughter got a kick out of it and has been caring for it like a baby ever since. It definitely weirds me out like a Furby but not as annoying. Good toy.
customer_reviews.author: Damian L. Lau

customer_reviews.title: GRAND KIDS WENT CRAZY OVER THESE
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous interactive cuddles. My 7 and 4 year old grand kids, girl and boy, teach them their names and take care of them with joy.
customer_reviews.author: pamela cleary

customer_reviews.title: Most annoy you ever.
customer_reviews.text: My niece asked me to buy her one of these. There’s nothing wrong with the toy but after hours of her high pitched squealed, constant need for adults to consult the directions, and insistence that the thing is not a furby, I wish I’d never bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the Description is just 1 toy not 4  ------ Bad Quality and Too expensive----
customer_reviews.text: Be aware of the Description is just 1 toy not 4. My kid like it because it's a new toy, but in fact is too expensive if we talk about the quality of the product and the size.
customer_reviews.author: Naoufel

customer_reviews.title: Ages 5-8 loved!
customer_reviews.text: Great interactive gift. It’s important to be able to read directions (or have a parent help) to get most out of this gift because if u follow directions you can teach your hatimal many things. Bought 4 so far & each time they are big hits!!!
customer_reviews.author: LLP

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: No problems at all. Hatched fine, didn’t get stuck like others have. My daughters and I had a great time hatching the egg together.
customer_reviews.author: rickb2924

customer_reviews.title: One egg was great and one was broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 for Chrimass gifts . They work as advertised but one of the egg arrived broken . Unfortunately when they are broke the egg can hatch at all . You hace to take the bird out and play with it . So I had in toddler disappointed :( and one toddler supper happy
customer_reviews.author: Ale Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Love! Great quality & fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got my 8 year old nephew this hatchimal for his birthday and wow- pure joy! It is a great interactive toy that got the whole family involved and excited. Great quality toy- a fun purchase for kids and the whole family as it teaches about caring for others.
customer_reviews.author: JDP

customer_reviews.title: She hasn’t put it down.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter birthday. It hatched within an hour. She loves it! She’s barely put it down.
customer_reviews.author: Halcion85

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift even for adults
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my BF who secretly wanted his daughter to be gifted one so he could watch it hatch. Lol Ours hatched rather quickly considering we had it “off/sleeping” for over a week. The night we woke him up he hatched!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Very clever...
customer_reviews.text: Gave hatchimal to our grand daughter....she absolutely loved it...just thrilled watching it hatch, then playing for hours with it...
customer_reviews.author: Ken VB

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Never understood why these things were so popular but she loved it. Fun to watch it hatch but had a hard time figuring out what was wrong with it. It’s eyes changed so much so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Urban

customer_reviews.title: Cool to watch hatch
customer_reviews.text: Was really cool to watch hatch. That was our favorite part, it literally pecks it’s way out and breaks the egg, though it does take awhile and you have to keep rubbing it. It’s like a cooler, updated version of a Furby. It’s a little confusing which “stage” it’s in but it’s moods are color coded so it’s still pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin McGlone Vonderschmitt

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive, and most of the novelty of the toy is a one-time use. Kids can't wait to help it hatch (45 minutes, in my case). Then all you have is a stuffed animal that makes some noises. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old loves waiting for it to hatch and continues to live playing with the hatchaminal as it grows and learns.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Hatchimal for almost half price during a daily deal before Christmas for my niece, and she LOVES IT! Took a little longer to hatch and needed some assistance, but still a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Micah C.

customer_reviews.title: Enthralled the whole family
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 6 yr old niece for Christmas. No kidding, the Whole family sat watching her hatch it. We were totally enthralled. It was super fun for everyone. I was extremely impressed with the whole think.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious product. Super cute. Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price. Bye shipping. You things are absolutely adorable. If you've never watched the hotmail hatch you need to. Fun for kids and adults
customer_reviews.author: jessica prasch

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! Our grand wanted one of these for her birthday. She loved it from the minute she saw what it was. The excitement was so cute!
customer_reviews.author: yomama

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: These are popular and sell out fast. Nice to get one before Christmas and at a low er price than local stores.
customer_reviews.author: James Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but tiresome
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute item but my son quit playing with it after a few days. It was "too demanding" according to him. He is six years old and didn't want to pay that much attention to it.
customer_reviews.author: syndi schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Just as seen on the image, expensive toy kids love
customer_reviews.text: ITEM is exactly as the image. A very expensive toy. My nieces love them I think it’s a bit of a waste of money though. I buy these when amazon has them on sale. Not worth 60$
customer_reviews.author: SweetCupcake

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and cute gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was super happy with this. She hasn't put it down since she received it for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: THOUVY

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Super pretty colors. The value was just right.
customer_reviews.author: K Jinks

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 16 year old, she wanted it so bad. She hatched it, the bottom comes off but you have to pull pretty hard. She just wanted to see how it hatched but it’s a cute little thing
customer_reviews.author: DCarter

customer_reviews.title: Exhausting
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but the instructions are so difficult to follow and the animal requires so much
customer_reviews.author: brittany gummo

customer_reviews.title: Hatchimal Malfunction!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we got a defective one. My 5 year old grandson was SO excited to receive this gift and tenderly got it to hatch. However once hatched, his hatchamal had technical deficiencies and was stuck making groaning noises and it nothing else! We emailed Amazon and are confident we’ll get a replacement; however on Christmas Eve my grandson was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Dodge-Dalessio

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find this on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: These have been out of stock at major retailers near me, so I was happy to find one on Amazon. It was everything my granddaughter wanted, and the toy seems to be fairly durable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fabert

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money - a toy to be enjoyed!
customer_reviews.text: This toy hatched exactly as it was supposed to. The anticipation of the critter hatching was so much fun for us, and then once we got it out of the shell we had even more fun training it! This is a really great toy. Ours is BumWee. Super adorable and a lot of fun for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: minecrafts-bro

customer_reviews.title: Idea great.  Same toy in 2.  Doesn't work that well in all phases.'
customer_reviews.text: Love idea. Doesn't work predictably enough to be worth it. Unfortunately both kids got same stuffed toy.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Extremely annoying
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a Christmas present. It’s overpriced and boring. The egg shutdown before hatching and had be restarted. The creature does the same things over and over, doesn’t respond well to commands, and has a very loud and weird moan-y voice. Annoying, boring, loud.
customer_reviews.author: ADG

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the time it hatches
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas. It’s fun for the time it takes to love and care for it while it’s hatching then she lost interest. Came packaged well and on time!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money you spend on it you'd expect the animal to stay inside the egg a bit longer. Then once it's out the fun dies down and it's at the bottom of the toy bin
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Little human LOVED it and loved watching it hatch. Got what we expected! Yet another annoying childrens toy I have learned to tune out!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hinckley

customer_reviews.title: Not as exciting as we expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not as exciting as expedited. Glad I waited a year to buy it for less than what they cost a year ago. Very neat watching it hatch but the excitement stopped there.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten M Mackin

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it even after a year
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this hatchimal. Had it for a year now and he still plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Ababon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My child was very happy that's all I care. Much cheaper than some of the other versions
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 3 year old daughter for Christmas. She loved it. She was occupied with it the whole day. And still plays with her little chicken after it hatched.
customer_reviews.author: Very good

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My whole family gathered around my 4 year old niece waiting for the egg to hatch on Christmas Day! Great fun, and a great memory! Very happy with purchase, so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L. Novara

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my niece. She was terrified at first when it began tapping on the egg. But my whole family was mesmerized by the hatching process. When the hatchimal finally came out, my niece quickly fell in love with the cute furry animal.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bush

customer_reviews.title: It brings much enjoyment to the child getting it.
customer_reviews.text: It came in on time and hope it’s the one my grandchild wanted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The dumbest toy ever, after it breaks out all it does is light up and make stupid noises, kids were over in about 2 hours
customer_reviews.author: ChrisS.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old daughter at Christmas. She loved watching it hatch and played with it until it ‘grew up’. She doesn’t play with it much now.
customer_reviews.author: AirForceMom

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to hatch. My niece was to impatient ended up not being to happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Made a Little Girl Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for our Granddaughter. She was absolutely thrilled to receive this. The hatching did not take as long as I expected. Very happy with this, so far.
customer_reviews.author: Toms Wife

customer_reviews.title: Exciting gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great gift I bought for my daughter. Once the egg cracks the excitement is pretty much over though. She hasn’t played with it much since it hatched
customer_reviews.author: Leanna DeGoede

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old niece and she loved it! The only thing that's confusing it getting the hatchimal out of the shell, you really have to pull!
customer_reviews.author: Savanah Diederich

customer_reviews.title: Surprise
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and my friend daughter love her mystery hatchimal
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift, a bit costly for my budget.
customer_reviews.text: The Birthday girl and all her guest LOVED the anticipation of what was coming when the egg opened. Great gift, but I never would have chosen it if it hadn’t been requested.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Niece loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my niece who totally adores it. Egg is not as big as i thought though.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these for my granddaughters for Christmas, they will love them
customer_reviews.author: Renea D.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Cute stuffed animal that cracks from shell really not for younger children due to so many instructions and things it has to do to interact with them
customer_reviews.author: wants and needs

product_meta.title: Hatchimals Mystery - Hatch 1 of 4 Fluffy Interactive Mystery Characters from Cloud Cove (Styles May Vary)
product_meta.description: For the first time in Hatchimals history, who you'll hatch is a total mystery! Inside one egg are four possibilities: You could hatch a Super fluffy bunwee, pandor, Hedgehog or elefly! With soft fur, ears and tails, These mysterious new friends love cuddles and snuggles. Raise your Hatchimals mystery from baby to toddler to kid and experience all new music and games! You can even teach your Hatchimals mystery how to say your name and they'll remember! Your new friend will use your name in every day chat. For even more fun, record new names again and again! To finally find out who's inside, hold and play with your colorful speckled egg. The more you play with your egg, the more Your Hatchimal will respond! Tap the shell to hear your new friend tap back! When you see a pair of glowing rainbow eyes, that means it's hatching time! With your help, your fluffy Hatchimal will Peck, Peck, Peck out of its shell! Ready to meet a Super cute bunwee, pandor, Hedgehog or elefly? Hatch The mystery!
feature_bullets: New mystery hatch: for the first time ever, you have no idea who's inside You could hatch a supper fluffy bunwee, pandor, Hedgehog, or elefly (Or maybe someone else) use your love and care to hatch a speckled egg, and meet an adorable new friend
Super fluffy fur: for the first time ever, These adorable Hatchimals have super fluffy patterned fur They even have expandable wings Hatch The mystery and cuddle up with your new friend
They learn your name: teach your Hatchimals mystery how to say your name Once they know your name, they'll use it in everyday chat You can even record new names again and again

Raise from baby to kid: discover your Hatchimals mystery, then raise them from baby to toddler to kid At each stage, you'll discover brand-new music and games Hatchimals mystery egg is for kids aged 5 + Requires 2 x AA batteries (included)
Includes: 1 Hatchimal, instruction guide, cheat Sheet
